1.content:
It was dark the night the terrible event happened. To this day you don't remember much about it. You can recall that it was dark, storming, and that something caused your parents to swerve off the road and crash. How you survived is beyond expression of words, miracle does not put to justice how you emerged unharmed from the wreck. Still, your life has gone better since that night. After the crash, you were taken in by a Pokemon, and are now their little child.

Who was that Pokemon?
1.title: The Crash

11.content:
You wake up, and you find yourself being gently rocked back and forth by a Female Gardevoir. "Where am I?" You ask her. "I'm sorry Human Boy." Gardevoir said. "When I encountered the Car your family was traveling in, It was just you knocked out, with a few scrapes, and you were laying in a puddle of your parents, and your sister's, blood." "What?" You said scared.

"I tried healing them, but it was no use. I could only close the scars up on you." Gardevoir said. "Alright." You said getting down from Gardevoir's Arms, You were still 4'3, and 10 years old. You quickly ran away with tears scraping down your face.

You stopped at a nearby tree stump, and curled up in a ball and cried. An Hour Later, Gardevoir had found you, and put her hand on your shoulder. "Come with me." Gardevoir said. She teleported you out of there, and you appear in a Cobblestone House in the woods, and it had a nice family in it.

"Hello Hun." Said a Gallade reading a Newspaper on the couch, "Hey Dear." Gardevoir said. "Hi Mommy!" a Ralts said, running to her. Gardevoir accepted the Ralts' Hug, and you stopped crying. "Is that Ralts a boy or a girl?" You ask. "Girl, Ralts, this is a human, we live alongside them in this world." Gardevoir explained.

"Do you want to join our Family, we have lots of fun." Gardevoir asked. "Yeah, plus, it would be little more exciting having a human in the family." The Gallade said. "Yeah! Please join our Family Human!" Ralts said. "Sure, but my real name isn't human, it's..
11.title: Gardevoir's Care

111.content: My Real Name isn't human, it's Alex." You said. "Alright, our last name is Voir, so how about your new name is Alex Voir?" Gardevoir said. "Alright." You said. "Come to my room Alex!" Ralts begged. "Alright." You repeated. "Be careful playing with her, she's only 8." Gardevoir said. "Thanks for telling me." You said. What happens after going to Ralts' room?
111.title: Alex Voir

choices: A Gallade flask (Allows Pokemon transformation into a Gallade)
1113.content:
About 5 years had passed, and You were truly apart of Gardevoir's family now. You were now 15, and Ralts, your little sister, had evolved into a Kirlia. You were currently in the back yard, training with Gallade, the Pokemon who has been your father for 5 years. Gardevoir, your new mom, had been trying to teach you how to teleport and and use Psychic such abilities.

"I think I wanna leave home for a while." You said. "Why?" Gardevoir asked. Kirlia then opened the door, and came in. "I'm back from Pokemon School!" She said joyfully. "Hey Little Sis." You say. "Hey Alex! What's Wrong?" Kirlia asked. "I'm gonna be leaving home for the next year, I'll be back by Christmas Morning." You said, getting up, and grabbing the bag that had been sitting by the door.

"Why Alex?" Kirlia answered, shocked. "I need to find out if this is some kind of curse I have. Maybe I was the one who got my original family killed." You explained. "You know that wasn't your fault." Gallade said. "If you're leaving home, then take these." Gardevoir said. Gardevoir pulled something from her dress pocket, and handed it to You.

What was the item she gave You?
1113.title: A Few Years Pass

choices: you are engaged tto a shiny gardevoir
11131.content:
Gallade:take this communicator, that way we'll be able to keep in touch
Alex: okay father,
you go up and hug Gallade, Gardevoir, and kirlia
Kirlia:come back soon

as you leave you realize Gardevoir (your mother) is crying
Alex: it'll be alright mother, as i said, i'll be back christmas morning,
Gardevoir:we'll miss you,
Alex:i know,
Gardevoir:i hope you find the asnwer your looking for,
Gallade:go gettim' tiger
Alex:yes father
and on that note, you leave, to find your grandfather, he'll know,
3 months has past and you have made countless friends,
a wartortle, an absol, and a ledian.

Wartortle:call them on the communicator,
Alex:i broke it trying to save you from that flock of fearow,
Wartortle:i forgot,
Ledian:wait, if you were raised by a family of psychc pokemon,
doesnt that mean that you can talk to them telepathically?
Alex:my father didnt teach me that yet, all i know is to teleport, and use psychc
abbilities,
Absol:what did you say your grandfather's house look like?
Alex:its blue, with a white roof,
Ledian:isnt that it?
as you look you see your grandfather with his skarmory on the porch
Alex:grandfather!
Grandfather:Alex? is that you?
Skarmory:yes it is its him
Alex:tell me, did our family do anything to get cursed by any chance?
Grandfather:yes, you see, my brother, your uncle, had a marowak when he was young,
they were the the greatest friends, then when she had her baby cubone, team rocket tried to get the skull it wears,
and in the mission, marowak was killed, my brother was so sad that day, 3 years has past since that day and he
became the mayor of lavender town since mr. fuji past away, and he decided to build a radio tower since johto
had a radio tower, so he demolished the pokemon tower, then marowak cursed our family for their offspring to
suffer in the worst way, he didnt believe it, but he died whem his house was being robbed by team rocket, he killed
him, his wife, his daughter, and his cubone, leaving our nephiew left to suffer the fact that he saw his parents death
and couldnt do a thing about it, and the same had happened to you, but tell me, where have you been living?
Alex:i have been living with a Gardevoir, Gallade, and a Kirlia
Grandfather:and who are your firends?
Alex:this is wartortle
Wartortle:hey
Alex:ledian
Ledian:greetings
Alex:and absol
Absol:hello
Grandfather:okay, how long did it take you to get here?
Alex:about 4 months,
Grandfather:wow, shouldnt you go home Alex? its 2morrow is christmas,
Alex, i know, but i can teleport, its cool,
Grandfather:i'll keep your friends here so i have other company
Alex used teleport
the next morning
Gardevoir:where is he?
Gallade:his communicator hasnt responded
Kirlia:i she dead?
you walk through the door
Alex:not quite yet,
all gasped in surprisement
gardevoir runs up to you in tears hugging you
Gardevoir:god i was worried about you!
Gallade:welcome home son,
Alex:its good to be home, and how could i forget my little sister?
you pick her up and hug her
Kirlia:i missed you
Alex: same here, i figured out why my parents died,
Gallade:how?
Alex:have you heard about the rumored curse of the dead marowak?
Gallade:yeah,
Alex:its true, my uncle was the one who gave my family the curse,
honestly, i have no clue how to break it,
Gardevoir:cursed or not, you are Alex voir, our son,
Alex:thnx mom,
Gallade:so, how 'bout we pick up where we left off 2morrow,
Alex:sounds great,
3 years later.......

1152.content:
you wake up to a distant call for help you jump up and run towards where it was coming from you see a female Eevee pinned against the wall by a Dragonite you notice the Dragonite pulling his fist back getting ready to punch the Eevee you sprint towards the Dragonite and upper cut him trying to make him let go of the Eevee you knock him back just off the Eevee you notice she is holding her leg you sprint in and grab the Eevee and run back towards the house you make it back to the door you ran out of to notice it is locked you yell Gardevoir then you hear her inside of your what is it you yell I've got a Dragonite after me you hear loud foot steps and the door opens you dash inside and then the door slams shut you turn to see Gardevoir staring at you and the Eevee already playing hero i see said Gardevoir you turn a place the Eevee on the couch well i heard her yell for help and i couldn't live with myself if didn't even try to help you say
sounds like how i meet Gardevoir says Gallade as he walks down would you like to deal with this Dragonite Gallade i can't hold him for much longer yells Gardevoir Gallade sprints out the door and uses psycho cut on the Dragonite knocking him miles away Gallade smiles as he walks into the house what are we gonna do about her said Gardevoir and pointed at the Eevee can she stay here the night you ask yes Jason but where is she gonna sleep she can have my bed i will sleep on the couch you say they both say ok then head back to bed and you carry Eevee into your room putting her into the your bed and putting a blanket over her then head out to the couch and laying down and falling asleep
1152.title: a cry for help

11521.content: you wake up to being tapped slightly um excuse me you open your eyes to spot the Eevee in front of you good morning you say where am i asked Eevee your at my family's house you say sitting up Eevee sits beside you before asking was it you that saved me last night. yes well i brought you back here then Gardevoir and Gallade defeated the Dragonite that was after you you say Eevee hugs into you before crying thank you but i have no where to go you notice someone coming down the stairs then walking towards you and then sits on the other side of Eevee morning Jason says Gardevoir what about your mother and father you ask well they live on the other side of forest where all the aggressive Pokemon are that is why i had that Dragonite after me they attacked my home and i was told to run and not to look back so i ran until that Dragonite cornered me and i yelled for help and you saved me and i think i might then she stops herself Gardevoir just laughs but manages to say you two are so cute Eevee turns to Gardevoir before asking would i be able to live here. it's okay with me but i will still have to ask my husband first said Gardevoir ask me what Gallade say as he walks in the door well Eevee ask if she could live here said Gardevoir sure that if Jason don't mind sharing his room said Gallade of course i wont you say we are gonna have to get another bed then Gallade said Gardevoir

12.content: Is the Ho-oh an anthro or a normal one? And is it male or female?
12.title: Ho-oh

122.content:
As you slowly come to you look up and see an anthro Ho-Oh you didn't relise that this beautiful Ho-Oh would be you new parents from now on you are to be the son of Ho-Oh so she and he yes he has been raising you as there own. You hear her sweet voice "Good morning there young one." you giggle contently.

As the Ho-Oh known as Rose and the Ho-Oh Daniel become your parents for you did not know of your parents deaths as the couple wanted to keep it hidden from you afraid of what it might do to your mental stability so slowly they changed you into and anthro Ho-Oh.

As you slowly grow up you slowly start to think like a pokemon as well as a human. You learned stuff average humans don't you learned pokemon moves such as future sight, sacred fire a move known by one family line it is an honor to learn this skill such as only a groudon can learn eruption.

As a jirachi doomdesire.

Zekrom fusionbolt.

And so on...
122.title: Anthro/Female

123.content:
Once there was a beautiful woman. One day she saw an injured Pokemon and helped it. After a while they feel in love and started meeting each other in a secret hiding spot. Then one day the woman was with child. They were happy. Until they almost got caught. They both knew they couldn't be with each other so they stopped seeing each other. Though they believed that one day they would be able to see each other once again.

"HARU, wake up!" "Huh... What time is it?" You get up and check your clock. "Oh It's morning." You thought. You get dressed and rush down to the kitchen where you see Mom washing dishes. "Good morning, Haru." Mom says. Then you reply. "Good morning, Mom" you grab the milk and cereal. Then walk to the table. You eat and finish breakfast.

When Mom Finishes the dishes she sits down with you. Then you ask. "Hey Mom, who is my Dad." She looks at you and says gently. " What makes you say that." You reply. "Well, when we came back from the market yesterday I saw some kids with their Dads." Mom started to look troubled and says "I can't tell you right now but maybe when your older." You felt disappointed but you believed that she will tell you when the time was right. You then ask. "What was he like?" She smiled and said. "Well he's big, strong, and funny, and gentle. Well that's all I can tell for now. You should get to your chores." You reply. "Okay." You walk out to the garden and do yard work. You finish and tell Mom your going to...
123.title: A New Beginning

1231.content:
"Okay, just be careful!" Mom says. You get to the forest and walk in. You wait at the foot of a hill. Then your Pokemon friends come out. First there's Growlithe, then Vulpix, Pigeotto, and Eevee. "Hey Haru." They said. "Hey guys." you reply. You were disappointed still about your talk with Mom. Then Vulpix asks. "What's wrong Haru." You then tell them about you asking Mom about your Dad. Then Pigeotto says. "Wait how old are you right now." "I'm ten." You replied. Then Eevee says. "Don't get too down maybe one day you'll probably be able to meet your Dad as well." "Thanks Eevee" you replied. "What game should we play today."
Then you hear something outside the forest. You all run to the edge of the forest and see a bunch of strange men with Pokemon attacking the town. You then saw some walking toward your house. "You guys should get going." You said running out of the forest to your house. "Mom" You yelled when you walked in the house. "Haru! I know and I need you to listen to me." Mom said. "Okay." You replied. "I need you to go up stairs and hide." "Why." You asked "Please just do it." She urges. You listen and run up to your room and hide under your bed.
1231.title: The Forest

12311.content: Suddenly you hear the door open. A man shouts. "Search the house!" You felt scared and hear someone running up the steps and walk in the room. You held your breathe and hoped he didn't find you. Then he went back down and you started to breathe again. You hear talking. Something about a child of a Pokemon. Then you hear Mom saying sternly. "I don't know what your talking about." Then a man says. "You know something. Okay men let's take her and burn the house." They leave and you get out from under the bed. You run down and see flames. "NO..." You thought. You then run out the back and watch the flames engulfing your house. Then you saw the forest on fire as well. "No... Not them too." You run in the forest and see Growlithe with Vulpix. You told them. "We have to get out of here." Then Growlithe says. "What about Eevee and Pigeotto." "Pigeotto probably got out already but I'll search for Eevee. Just get out of here." They both leave and you start searching for Eevee. "Eevee!" You yelled. Then you hear a cry. You run toward it and see Eevee with its leg trapped between two rocks. You managed to get its leg but you were both in the burning forest with no way out. You both were close to death until a big blue Pokemon came and dosed the fire with water making a path for both of you. "Let's go." It said. You all make it out and met the others. "Are you all okay." The Pokemon said. "Yes. Thank you." You Replied. "Who are you?" You asked. "I am Suicune." He said...
12311.title: The Bad Men

123111.content: "Can you help me?" You ask. "No I can't. I have to return to my master." Suicune said. "Please... The men who did this... They took my Mom." You said. "Why?" Suicune asked. "I don't know, but they said Something about her knowing of a child of a some Pokemon." When you said exactly that Suicune's expression changed. He then said. "Please come with me." "Why? Where are you taking me?" You ask. "To my master. I think he might know what to do. Your friends can come along as well." You and your friends go with Suicune to an old tower. You then see two more Pokemon out in front of the door. The first one had yellow fur. Then the other had brown, thick fur. The yellow one says. "Suicune why is there a human with you and why is he here?" "Calm down Raikou. Is there a reason that there's a human amongst us Suicune." The brown one asks. "Yes I think the master should meet him Entei." Suicune replies. "If you think so." Entei replies. Then you and Suicune enter. Then you see the legendary Ho-oh standing in the middle of the room. You then remember all the stories Mom told when you were little. "Hello Suicune. Who's this?" Ho-oh asks. "Someone I think you should talk too."
123111.title: Meeting The Master.

1231111.content: "I leave you two alone." Suicune says as he leaves. You both sat in awkward silence until Ho-oh asks. "What's your name child and why are you here?" "Haru and I need help." You reply. When you said your name his expression went from calm to surprised. "What do you need help with?" Then you reply with. "My Mom. Some men took her." "Do you know why?" He asks. "They said she knew something about a child of some Pokemon." "Has your Mother told you anything about me?" "She has told me some stories when I was little." "What kind of stories?" "Umm... The legend kind I guess." "Has she told you anything about your Father." "I umm... a little... Well not really. Wait do you know who my Father is?" You ask. "Yes." "Who?" He then says. "Your looking at him." Your heart sinks when you heard that. "You... No this is a mistake. You can't be." You fall to the floor and ask. "Why and how?" He then says. "Your Mom didn't tell anyone because it wasn't safe. Your not like most humans. That's why those men attacked." You were bewildered he then said. "Its getting late. I'll have Suicune escort you to your room. We'll talk more in the morning." Then Suicune enters and says. "Please come this way."
1231111.title: I Am You Father

13.content: Is this Blaziken Anthro, or normal.
13.title: Choices before continuation

1312.content: A beautiful Blaziken girl is holding you to your chest, warmth surrounding you as she does so. "It's ok," is all she says as she rushes off somewhere, covering you in her arms and snuggling you even deeper into her chest. As she rushes off somewhere, you close your eyes, and fall asleep. When you awaken, her soft blue eyes are staring at you, she also appears to be humming a tune, in an effort to keep you asleep. Do you want to?
1312.title: Blaze

choices: You've been asleep for three years!
13121.content:
You really want to fight the feeling, but something in your body causes you to gradually fade into a deep sleep. In the sleeping bliss surrounding your body, you hear footsteps from another direction, then an exchange of sentences, but your to asleep to figure them out. You can only listen on as the conversation quickly becomes an argument, and then, an intense blast of heat engulfs your body. You hear a scream of shock and then a muffled explosion. You quickly feel Blaze's heartbeat quicken, realizing she's running quite fast.

You remain asleep for some time, but when you awaken...
13121.title: Deep Sleep

132.content: Can you at least understand this Blaziken?
132.title: Normal- an ill-defined word.

14.content: An adult female Absol was gazeing at me with worry as I opened my eyes. 'What's going on?' I wonder as I gazed around the cave I was lieing in. "What happened?" I asked the Absol, knowing that i'd understand it due to being, what was it the docters called me? an anthro? Yes, thats it an anthro.... A monster...at last thats what the other kids in my class called me.While waiting for an answer I gazed down at my claws that came wiith being part...
14.title: Absol

choices: You were going to deal with the bullies.
141.content:
You were a Houndour- a Pokemon known for being a pack animal. You had friends back in school- mostly other Anthros, though some Anthro-liking kids had your friendship, too. Sadly, this seemed to attract all kinds of bullies.

For some reason, you recall that those bullies had something to do with why your folks took you on this drive... But why?
141.title: Dour company.

142.content:
You were an anthro Slakoth. Because of this, you were a little slow on the reaction time (amongst other things) and had much thicker fingernails and toenails.

You also had a light fur coat, like other Slakoths, and often had a bit of a dopey grin on your face. Other children often treated you like a moron and (though you didn't show it) it hurt your feelings extremely. Regardless, your parents loved you, no matter what you looked like. Unfortunately, the Absol had some bad news to tell you.

"Poor child..." the Absol began.
142.title: Lazy hybrid.

choices: Hybrid of both/new breed of Vulpix.

152232.content:
Two Lucario one a male the other a female. They were married and lived in quiet decent cave. The Lucario was 7 feet tall while the female was 6'10 ft. They were going for a stroll in the forest just talking.
"Say Kajiko." Said the female.
"Yes Yuki." He said.
"Do you hear or feel something nearby with your aura?"
"Yes I do. Two to be exact. One which is weak another is alive." They rush towards the aura imminating it. They then saw a car and a woman laying next a baby.
Yuki shocked layer next to the baby. Kajiko knelt down to help the woman. She spoke to him and said, "Please take care of my baby. She needs somebody. I am no longer am going to here to care for her. Please promise to take care of her. Please take care of Luia. Tell her that her mother loves her....." She then layed her head down, she stopped breathing. Yuki cried at this.
Kajiko comforted her. "Shh, please don't cry. Yuki. I'm afraid too but this baby needs a home." He said.
Then she said, "Our baby will be loved." She said as she picked up the baby. The baby opened her eyes and looked at the mother. The baby was a new born. She must have been born during this time. She was really small, '04 inchea tall. She then snuggled into her mom's fur. She smiled at this. Kajiko smiled back. "We promise to take care of her." She said then went back home. When they get there. they see....
152232.title: Somebody nearby

1551111.title: Hate this rule yet?

15511112.content: Final decisions to be made...
15511112.title: Finally there.... (Congrats! ^_^)

155111121.content:
"Open your eyes, child." Someone was calling to you, softly, urging you to open your eyes and awaken. You wanted to, but it felt so hard. Even the simplest of movements were lethargic and took what breath you had out of you. When you finally could open your eyes, the sight before seemed completely unreal. It was Reshiram, the Reshiram. Even more confusing was that, she (upon looking at her body) had similar characteristics of a human female. She was beautiful, and her deep blue eyes seemed to infinitely radiate a calmness that you feel could quell the rage of a rampaging Gyarados. Everything about you hurt, now that you were awake and your senses were coming back around. It was a throbbing ache, thankfully, but it still made movement nearly impossible. Seeing your eyes open was thankfully enough to get her to relax, if she was panicked or upset. "Good, you are not dead, thank Arceus for that~." You were confused, what was she talking about? "What," you began, "Do you mean?" Geez, even something as simple as talking hurt. Something in your mind was telling you that recovery was going to be a long and hard road. But, where did these injuries come from? Where was mom, and dad? Why could you only see this Reshiram? Well, perhaps that was because you were in a dark cave and her fur was white as snow, but there were bigger questions to be answered. "Miss..." You started, and she promptly stopped you, "Please, just call me Reshy~." "Okay, Reshy, where are my parents? And, why am I in so much pain?" She stopped, her eyes seemed to widen a little, "You don't remember?" She hesitantly asked. "Remember what?" Came your response to her. Seeing this as something no young child should know, she shook her head, "It's nothing my sweet child, you just hit your head a little while ago~." It seemed believable, all of the pain was coming from your head, so it made sense to you. Reshy nestled you a little closer into her supple bosom, rocking gently back and forth. Even if you were ten, there was still something about being held to someone's heart and gently rocked. Completely nestled in loving warmth, it took mere seconds for you to fall asleep in the dragon's arms. After you were soundly asleep, she sat there, contemplating, "What now? He doesn't seem to remember what happened, he's completely without a family." It then dawned on her, she could be your family. She'd never done it before, but she couldn't just leave this young boy alone. She had things to do, so to keep you safe, she put you...

(Yeah, yeah, I skipped one of my own rules. But, how many of you enjoy this already? Hmm? You can add a male option somewhere, but I'm gonna keep this going, okay? Besides, I'm the author, it's my chapter~)
155111121.title: The Unexpected.

1551111212.content: Needing to keep herself focused while she did a few things, like clean up the wreckage from the accident your real family had perished in, she decided you would be safest from anything inside of her, specifically her stomach. Lifting you up very gently, she kissed your head and opened up, slowly pushing your little body inside of her mouth. (For future reference, we'll say she's currently about forty feet tall.) You couldn't tell the difference between her maw or her chest, both were equally warm and felt as luxurious. Not wasting any time, she tilted her head gently back and sent you down into her with a wet soft glk! Moving down her throat, the muscles on either side of your body gently massaged you as they pushed you deep, deep into her body. It felt wondrous, something beyond description, something special. This odd sensation caused you stir, but you fell back into sleep not long after, not enough the assess where you were. Finally, her throat opened up and pushed you into her stomach, which closed in around your form and cradled you in its warmth, keeping you safe. Reshy let out a content sigh and rubbed her stomach, "Sleep well, my sweet~." Flapping her wings, she took off into the skies to clear up the road where the crash had occurred.
1551111212.title: A voracious mother.

choices: She surfaces from right under you!
She's hiding in the trees, giggling to herself...
155111122.content:
You turned and waved goodbye to your mom and dad and walked out the door slinging a bag with some dry clothes and a towel as you went to go swimming. You thought to yourself, 'Man, I can't believe I of all people in the whole world, became friends with her! I swear this day is gonna be perfect!' You ran through the woods next to your house passing the friendly forest Pokèmon smiling and waving as a cool breeze lightly tried to prevent you from running. You silently laughed at the wind's silly antics and ran toward where you and her would meet. Who was her? She was a Pokèmon, a very nice one too. She was nice, she was warm, soft, fun loving, gentle, and she had the power to sense every living organisms truths.
This Pokèmon...was Reshiram. The Vast White Pokèmon of legend was always playing with you ever since you activated that little white stone and brought her back. Since then, you two could never be closer. The both of you were always messing around, it always put a smile on your face. You've had depression multiple times, and Reshiram never failed to make you happy again. The one thing you always love the most is before you leave, you and Reshiram relax together curled up while she lovingly holds you, as if she were your mom!
You arrive at the lake and put your swim trunks on and remove your shirt, socks, and shoes and dive into the warm water. As you look around, you wonder, where is she?
155111122.title: The Perfect Day...Made Terribly Bad.

choices: The crash happens and Reshiram tells you...
The crash happens where you are!
1551111221.content: As you scan the surroundings wondering how a legendary dragon of considerable size was hidden so well. You look around a little longer and decide she must be a little late or something, so you begin to float lazily on your back. As you float, you neglect to notice the large shadow lurking directly under you. You nearly have a heart attack as a large body suddenly explodes out of the water and begins flying up with you on its back. As you regain your bearings, you realize Reshiram had been under you the whole time! She nearly gave you a heart attack when she got the jump on you. She suddenly curls up into a ball, stops ascending, wraps herself around you as her wings shroud you and she cannonballs back into the water. She surfaces and lies out as her wings deposit you on her soft belly. She sees your terrified glare and frowns. "Oh I'm sorry," she started looking away, "I didn't mean to scare you so badly. It was a prank, you know that right?" You looked down for a second, then nodded. "Just don't do that again ok," you asked, "I don't mind some of the others, but that one scared me to death." She frowned for a second, then smiled as her wings pulled you close to her as she nuzzled you quickly and let you go as she dove under again.
1551111221.title: Well hello there!

15511112211.content:
As the two of you begin to play in the water, a certain car is driving down the road. This car contained two very important people. As they drove, a large semi on the opposite lane suddenly loses control and blocks the road as a giant, screwed up heap of metal. Before the car could avoid the semi, the trailer smashed the car and sent it tumbling with it. Both vehicles are totalled, both drivers and the car's passenger are killed.
As you get playfully swamped by water as Reshiram splashes you, she suddenly stops and a look of terror overshadows her happiness. This catches your eye and you wonder what is wrong. Reshiram's eyes tear up and she hugs you as she shows you what she sees, your mother and father have died. You're devastated at the news, your face suddenly melts into a sadness someone your age should never experience. A soul chilling, gut wrenching, life destroying sadness that causes you to bury your head in Reshiram and cry your eyes out. It was horrible, you just lost your family, you couldn't believe any of it, this had to be a dream! Reshiram wipes the tears from her eyes and begins to attempt to comfort you. Thoughts raced as you cried more and more, where would you go, who would take care of you, where will you live, what will become of you as an existing being of this world?
Reshiram looked out and thought of something, you two were really close, maybe she could take your parent's place. She looked down at you and popped the idea, "Well, what if I fill in as your parents?" In your sadness, the idea swirled around, congregated with a few others and you realize, she has a point. She has always acted very parent like when it came to you. The idea didn't sound so bad, and you looked up at her and the look in your eyes said more than enough. She smiled and continued to comfort you as you accepted your new fate, becoming the son of the Vast White Dragon, Reshiram.
15511112211.title: Son of The Vast White Dragon

1551112.title: Zekrom

155111212.content:
Your Father and you were on your way back from a camping trip. You were in the front taking a nap until you hear a loud noise. "BOOM!!!" You wake up and see the front of the car on fire. "DAD!" you shout. You see him dead right next to you. You try to get out but the doors jammed. Smoke fills the car temporarily blinding you. Then you see figure outside the car but you couldn't make it out. "HELP!" you cry. Then smoke fills your lung and become unconscious.

A few minutes later you wake up and look around. You see a Pokemon sitting next to you. "Who are you?" you ask. "I am Zekrom." The Pokemon says in deep male voice. You sit up and remember the crash. Tears start coming down your face. "What's wrong." Zekrom asks. "My... My Dad is... He's dead." you reply sobbing. "I'm sorry about that." He replies. "I don't know what to do now." you answer. "I'll be your father." He answers with a smile. "Really?" you ask. "Yes" he replies. Zekrom and you stand up he walks up to you wrap in his arms.
155111212.title: Son of the deep Black Pokemon

15522.content:
Mother Victini:

I remember about that one eventful night where I raised my first child. I was a very lonely pokemon since I hadn't have a friend for almost a millenia. Even if my brother, Jirachi, share a similar isolation to mine, he never understands the loneliness of living alone. He only gets to live for 7 days ever millennium. i mated him only once since I failed to break his curse. Jirachi, and my previous human friend, are the only people I've known through my life.

Yesterday, I found a basket near the shore of my little island. Inside was a human baby girl crying.

"A baby? Hod did it end up here at my island. No one ever comes here."

Looking inside the basket, I found a letter containing a message.

To anyone who finds my child, please raise her as your own. My time is running short as our rival pirates ambushed us. We were defeated and my time is running short. I am also a pirate mother writing this. My husband sacrificed himself to save our child. I will come too. Hmph. Looks like prince Manaphy is not siding with us this time. Whether you're a human or pokemon, please raise her so that she can live with life

finishing the letter saddens me to know that this little girl lost her family. Until she looks to my big blue eyes. she said "mama".

What an encounter I've gotten myself into. Using my psychic abilites, I brought her inside the lighthouse. But gives me quite a heavy decision to make. Should I turn her to a Victini like me? Or should she still be a human? One way or another, i have a feeling that the truth will come back to us someday.
15522.title: Normal Victini

1553322222111112.content:
You slowly wake up, eyes fluttering open and examining your surroundings. You try and rise off the grassy earth, but something very heavy seems to be pressing down on your back. You look closely and realize something, this grass is red, and the earth is moving up and down, rather steadily.
You look up and scream in fear. The thing that was holding you down was a Flareon, except it was like, ten times bigger than you. Your scream was not unnoticed, because its eyes flickered, then silently opened.
The Pokèmon looked down at you, eyes lighting up and it squealing with glee.It then proceeded to hug you and affectionately nuzzle you, giving off a happy sound that had a female tint to it, thing is though, how small are you or how big is she?
1553322222111112.title: Awkward Awakening

15533222221111121.content: Big trees, grass as tall as you, the Flareon nuzzling you, you come to the conclusion you're very small, but how small are you?
15533222221111121.title: Teeny Tiny...

15533222222211.title: Female

155332222222111.content:
It was during the day when you were in the pokémon forest behind your home and playing with the pokémon in it. The pokémon varied from pidgey to the occasional rattata, but there have been some other pokémon like pikachu from deeper in the forest. You have seen only one when you were trying to find the pokémon that were hiding from you, but you stared at it for a moment before it looked at you and it moved closer to you in curiosity. You were a little nervous as the pikachu came closer to you and it stopped when it was about a few inches from you trying to get a good look at you.

“I saw you playing with the other pokémon in the forest.” It said you heard a girl tone in its voice

“Yep.” You said smiling a little since the meeting with the pikachu

“What are you doing this far in the forest?” she asked

“Playing a game with the pokémon.” You said

“Shouldn’t you get home to your parents?” she asked

You looked at the sky and it was started to get a little late, but your parents told you that they hired a babysitter to watch you when it got late and she should be getting to the house soon.

“I want to find the last one before I have to leave.” You said whining a little and she giggled

“Alright, which one is it?” she asked

“Hmm, pidgey I think.” You said

“Hmm well, I think I saw it flew into a tree.” She said looking around trying to find the right tree

“Hmm, maybe I should just let them win this one.” You said looking at the setting sun

“Maybe that would be best.” She said concerned for you

Either way, you had to get back to the house before you were late and had her waiting for you. It was getting close to dusk and you were close to the back door where you usually use to get into the forest, but you heard a car pulling into the drive way. You knew it had to be her so you into the house and walked into the living room of the house to meet your baby sitter.

“Have you been waiting here to see me?” a slightly older female voice said noticed you in the room as she came into the house

“Hmm, I was out in the forest playing with the pokémon.” You said being honest and she nodded

“So you’re Ryan.” She said and nodded

“I’m Sira.” She said

Your baby sitter is tall compared to you, but she is 6’ tall, has a golden tan color on her body, has white hair in a style of a comet’s tail; but it reaches the middle of her back, wearing a gray shirt with ‘Original One’ written in kanji, gray pants with gray socks and gold color shoes, a spiked gold choker around her neck, golden green eyes with red irises. She walked over to you and gently picked you up in her arms before giving you a warm hug. You noticed that she had a nice figure and it looked as big as you, but you weren’t looking at her chest or behind.

“I thought I heard you breathing hard like you were running to get here before me.” She said before rubbing your head sweetly

You both shared a hug before setting you on the couch and turned on the tv.

“Stay here and I’ll go make us something to snack on before we do something fun.” She said with a smile as she head into the kitchen

~I hope he doesn’t figure out that I’m Arceus in disguise.~ she thought while she was looking at you watching tv

She pulled out a letter for you from your parents in case something happened to them and with the letter is their will. She put it on the counter near where she was making your and her snack, but she was thinking of what is going to happen to them. She made some small sandwiches for you and made herself a few sandwiches. You were watching some funny cartoons that made you laugh when she came back with your and her snacks.

“What are you watching?” she asked you

“Some cartoons.” You said before biting into your first sandwich

The two of you watched cartoons while eating your snack and soon it was about time for your parents to get home. The phone started to ring and she got up to get it; you were looking at her talking on the phone with the tv slightly covering what is being said on the phone. It was about 5 minutes before she finished with the phone call and she came over to you before turning the tv off.

“That was the hospital calling.” She said to you sounding sad and serious

“What happened?” you asked wanting to know if something happened to your parents

“The doctor told me that your parents were caught in a wreck with another car.” She said and you were sad and worried about them

“Are they going to be ok?” you asked looking for hope

“After the impact, they were seriously hurt and needed medical attention; but they had only minutes before they were dead.” She explained and you started to cry as she hold you in her arms

That was the day that changed everything, but after enough time had passed you had your parents funeral. You were standing tall and proud for them as they wanted you to be, but you were holding sira’s hand with an iron grip yet gentle. Sira became your legal guardian since you wanted to be with her, but you noticed something was wrong about her.
155332222222111.title: The day that changed

15533222222221.content: The roads were slick with fresh rain as minivan entered the forest way. A fog had settled in just past midnight and hoothoot could be heard, just as a 5 year old Beta looked out the window calling " chu" when the vehicle was ran off into the forest killing all in it if lightning didn't strike Beta. "Over here, I found a live one." called out a young Pichu. The parents checked Beta for injures finding out that he had black tiped little yellow ears and black lightning tail. " He looks like a human to me, and he looks like the baby in the photo on our mantle at home." said Pichu. "Lets get him home and worry about why his lightning bolt cheecks are crackling with electricity.' said Raichu. As beta grew up he found out that he was capable of using thunder shock, but also he was from Pichu's granpa's side of the family. During the late afternoon Beta and Pikachu( evolved Pichu ) were racing around the clearing as Mamma Pikachu set up the family picnic. Richu had brought out special training dummies for the boys to practice thier moves, "boys time to learn a new move." called Raichu.
15533222222221.title: Yes

1553322222222222222221.content: A mightyena is carrying you, running through the forest. As a cave in the side of a mountain comes into view, it slows down. Yips come from in the cave and the mightyena enters, setting you down inside gently. Poochyena pups soon swarm around you, sniffing curiously. The mightyena sits not far away, eyes pitying and kind. It starts to sink in, even in your young mind, just what you've lost. The pups back off as you begin to cry, and their mother steps up, licking your face compassionately.
1553322222222222222221.title: Howling Wolf

155332222222222222222221.content:
A Machamp is carrying you with his lower set of arms through the forest towards a mountain. As he starts going up the mountain, it starts to sink in what your situation is, despite your young age. As you start to cry, the Machamp sets you down on your feet and uses one its hands to wipe the tears off your face.

"Don't worry." the Machamp said "I'll take care of you."

The Machamp then put you on its back. You fall asleep soon after.
155332222222222222222221.title: Machamp it is

info.brief_description: You become a Pokemon's child after your parents die.
info.description:
As of 7/29/15
I LIIIIIIIIIIIIVE! After being all swarmed with school and the like, I'm gonna try to get back into the writing.com spirit. I don't know about adding new items, but I'll certainly add to the current ones when I'm on and can do so. Look forward to seeing what's happened!
As of 10/29/13
Vore is now allowed HOWEVER! I only allow it on the terms that no characters are to be digested. If the parent eats the child, said parent is NOT going to digest that child. If I see anything along the lines of that this new addition is being revoked IMMEDIATELY, so don't toy with me!
(As of 12/15/12)
THANKS FOR ALL THE ADDITIONS! (even though there really weren't many) Sorry I haven't been adding lately, school is in the way and everything so I'm usually busy or I'm working on my personal fanfic stories. I really haven't been on my account since summer at least so I get on and see this is almost to 50 chapters! (wow, what a milestone. >.> <.< ) Anyways I just wanted to thank all users who've added to this and I hope you check out my other items!

Read these if u know what's good for you.
Your parents die in a crash, but only knocking you unconscious. When you wake up, you're being held in a Pokemon's arms.

Rules are as follow;
1. You're very young, no older than ten years old. (Only exception is aging.)
2. I will allow the character's size to change, however, no smaller than 3cm tall(Main if u want), nor larger than 150ft(PokÃ¨mon).
3. I will allow anthros, just suggest before continuing.
4. There can be younger Pokemon with the parent who takes you in.
5.No M/M or F/F relations ok.
6. No cursing
7.There can be more than one parent of the same gender, just don't go over No.5 Ok?
8. No killing, extreme fetishes, etc.
9.If i see any chapters that have such bad grammar it makes no sense, i will completely revise it. You've been warned...
10.All PokÃ¨mon can talk and understand you.
There they are folks, enjoy the story! =P
